txt.en: 'Quickly! There is no time to lose. The Pristine Glade is being threatened. We protect one of the last of the sacred Old Trees. It helps us survive in this otherwise impossible land. As protectors of the Tree, we can not allow anything to happen to the Glade. \n\n'Go quickly. Do not waste time. Protect the Glade to the west from Saruman's prying eyes and soldiers.'

'You have made it in time, I hope. The Elders sent word that you were coming to defend the Glade. We have been protecting this Sacred Tree for generations. There is no duty with higher honour. \n\n'We must protect the Glade from Saruman's destructive ways. This is one of the last remaining Old Trees. We have heard that he has destroyed all others in Dunland. We cannot allow this to happen here.'
Saruman is attempting to attack the sacred ground of the Dunbog, and the Avanc-lûth need your help.
Talk to Maugan at the Pristine Glade
The Pristine Glade lies to the west of Lhan Rhos, beyond a cave.\n\nElder Déin has asked you to quickly go and help protect the last remaining secret of the Dunbog: the Pristine Glade.
